annonstext:
Scania is now undergoing a transformation from being a supplier of trucks, buses and engines to a supplier of complete and sustainable transport solutions. Sustainability at Scania is also about having a healthy workplace with diversity, inclusion and equal opportunities for men and women.

We are looking for a dedicated, Senior Project Manager to lead global and cross functional teams involving our dual brand bodybuilder partners, Scania business units and Scania R&D. The aim is to set the conditions to drive the shift towards sustainable transport solutions, all with the focus on our new technologies connected, electrified and autonomous vehicles.

What you will do

You will together with the management team support the organisation through exciting times where new technology meets new customer demands, new ways of working meets a modern agile leadership style, all to take place in this “new normal situation”.

As a Senior Project Manager you are expected to strongly contribute to the bus development organisation. You are responsible for driving the strategy and implement a safe, efficient and sustainable new way of working. You work closely together with our dual brand bodybuilder partners for the new technologies.

Who you are

You are a natural and proven leader with strong leadership skills. You have a lot of enthusiasm and the ability to see people and their capabilities. To succeed in this position, you are good at building strong teams and facilitate cross-functional work. You are communicative, show drive and passion. You are energized by challenges. “Outside the box” is not strange nor uncomfortable to you.

Expectation on the Global project manager role: 

• Highly motivated by the mission and challenges 
• Experience in driving change initiative and programs in an international environment.
• English is natural, Swedish is comfortable to you.
• Knowledge about Scania and Scania´s methods and processes is meritorious.

Most likely you have a formal degree in engineering or the equivalent experience. In addition, you are expected to have at least 5 years’ experience from working with technical products and in leadership roles.

For more information:

Contact FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, senior manager,  EMAIL ,  TELEPHONENO 8

Application 

Please send your application including CV, personal letter and certificates. Screening and interviews will be done continuously. 

We are looking forward to read your application! 

Scania is a world-leading provider of transport solutions. Together with our partners and customers we are driving the shift towards a sustainable transport system. In 2020, we delivered 66,900 trucks, 5,200 buses as well as 11,000 industrial and marine power systems to our customers. Net sales totalled to over SEK 125 billion, of which over 20 percent were services-related. Founded in 1891, Scania now operates in more than 100 countries and employs some 50,000 people. Research and development are mainly concentrated in Sweden. Production takes place in Europe and Latin America with regional product centres in Africa, Asia and Eurasia. Scania is part of TRATON GROUP. For more information visit: www.scania.com.
